summary: This document is an account authorization and indemnity agreement for a limited liability company named Southern Financial, LLC, allowing Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. to manage a securities account on behalf of the LLC. It outlines the authority granted to agents of the LLC and the responsibilities of the members regarding the account.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the managing member of Southern Financial, LLC, who authorizes Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. to open and manage a securities account for the LLC.

keyFacts: The document authorizes Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. to open a securities account for Southern Financial, LLC.
Jeffrey Epstein is the managing member of Southern Financial, LLC.
The authorization allows agents of the LLC to trade in stocks and securities on behalf of the company.
The agreement includes indemnity clauses protecting Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. from liabilities arising from disputes among LLC members.
The authorization remains in effect until written notice of termination is provided.
